definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
a turtle that pulls its head in/(fig.) coward/chicken

sentences.english: I also have a parakeet and a turtle named ? lider ?
sentences.chinese: 我養了一支小八哥還有一支烏龜它名叫滑行者。

sentences.english: I don't understand what Master Oogway was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白烏龜大師在想什麼。

sentences.english: And Google is the tortoise then?
sentences.chinese: 那麼谷歌就是那隻烏龜？

sentences.english: And the patience of the tortoise but not the slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 要有烏龜的耐心但又不能太慢。

sentences.english: In my house, you can see many big turtles .
sentences.chinese: 在我的房子裏，你能看見許多大烏龜。

sentences.english: As a kid, he burned off energy outdoors catching snakes and turtles.
sentences.chinese: 孩童時期，他就愛在野外撒歡，抓蛇，捕烏龜。

sentences.english: A day , one cuckold are taking a walk.
You are much slower than the turtles that flee back and forth in the peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 你比在花生醬中一羣東逃西竄的烏龜還要慢。

sentences.english: On land the turtle is ungainly , but in the water it is very agil.
sentences.chinese: 烏龜在陸地上很笨拙，但是在水裏卻很靈活。

sentences.english: The little turtle lived in the lotus pond.
Julia scowled at her jeweled tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 這時朱莉婭怒視着那隻嵌着鑽石的烏龜。

sentences.english: So the maid made up her mind and let the turtle go.
sentences.chinese: 所以丫環下了決心，要放走烏龜。

sentences.english: Master Shifu tries his best to train the panda into a real warrior according to Master Wugu's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 師傅謹遵烏龜的教誨，努力將熊貓培養成真正的武士。

sentences.english: When it saw Huang was awake, the turtle nodded to him three times and crawled out of his room.
sentences.chinese: 當它看到黃醒來後，烏龜向他點了三次頭，爬出房屋。

sentences.english: The first story was Aesop’s fable The Tortoise and the Hare.
sentences.chinese: 第一個故事是來自伊索寓言中烏龜和野兔賽跑的故事。

definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
